definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: With kettle body, portable and novelty, fashionable and elegant.
sentences.chinese: 優美流線型壺體，小巧玲瓏，時尚大方，精緻典雅。

sentences.english: A clipper-built radian is cut in thick bang.
sentences.chinese: 在厚劉海中剪出流線型的弧度。

sentences.english: The triangular arrowhead takes a streamline shape, with barbs for piercing.
sentences.chinese: 箭鏃呈三棱流線型，有倒刺，利於穿透。

sentences.english: The streamlined form also fares well on windy rooftops.
sentences.chinese: 這種流線型設計在風大的屋頂仍然適用。

sentences.english: Fluid bezier curves start out roughly.
sentences.chinese: 流線型的曲線，可以先粗繪出來。

sentences.english: These cars have a streamlined design, they are really gorgeous.
sentences.chinese: 這種車的流線型車容，實在太漂亮了。

sentences.english: Chen had pledged to streamline the government and make it more efficient.
sentences.chinese: 陳有保證到流線型政府和達到目標更多的生效的。

sentences.english: It adopts alloy fairing and advanced electrostatic painting and is luxury and beautiful in appearance.
sentences.chinese: 採用合金流線型外殼，先進的靜電噴塗，豪華美觀。

sentences.english: Streamlined body without pockets contributes to straight-through flow.
sentences.chinese: 流線型閥體，不再需要凹穴來幫助流體直線流通。

sentences.english: Clipper-built deck chair, comfortable siesta can be in summer cannot little spouse.
sentences.chinese: 流線型的躺椅，夏日裏可是舒適午睡不可少的伴侶。
計劃設計還是流線型的。

sentences.english: Slice through the water, don't plow. Make your middle name "streamline".
sentences.chinese: 走水無需劈波斬浪，要呈“流線型”。

sentences.english: Last week, their streamline car was stolen.
sentences.chinese: 上週他們流線型的汽車被人偷了。

sentences.english: This section introduces new features that will streamline project creation.
sentences.chinese: 這部分將介紹流線型項目創建的新特性。

sentences.english: New pattern running anti-convoy torpedoes were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 設計出了新型的流線型反護航艦隊魚雷。

sentences.english: The single seater aero car totes VW (Volkswagen) branding.
sentences.chinese: 這種流線型外形的單座車由大衆汽車生產。
